meanings.sent1: She quickly outfencing her opponent with her swift moves.
meanings.sent2: He always manages to outfencing his sparring partners during practice.
meanings.sent3: The young fencer outfencing the older ones was quite a sight to see.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to outfencing her fears was like a shining sword in battle.
meanings.sent5: The champion's ability to outfencing all challengers left a lasting impression on the crowd.

meanings.definition: The act of surpassing in fencing skill.
meanings.sent1: His outfencing of the other fencers earned him the gold medal.
meanings.sent2: Watching the master's outfencing was a true spectacle for the audience.
meanings.sent3: The outfencing competition at the tournament was intense and exciting.
meanings.sent4: Her swift movements in the outfencing match were like a dance of victory.
meanings.sent5: The trophy gleamed in the light, a symbol of his outfencing prowess.
